step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
You're raising your hands well, but try to keep your elbows a bit closer together as you bring them toward your forehead.
Excellent! You've spread your elbows wide behind your head, opening up your chest.
Great hold! You maintained the position effectively.
Nicely done reversing the motion and returning to the starting position.
Second rep starting strong, hands clasped in your lap.
Good effort bringing hands up. Focus on keeping those elbows tucked in a bit more as you move them towards your forehead.
Well done spreading your elbows wide behind your head, really opening up the chest and shoulders.
You held that stretch nicely. Keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Perfectly reversed motion back to the start. Great job completing the second set!

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close as you bring your hands toward your forehead, and then spread them wide behind your head. This helps open your chest and shoulders effectively.
